Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bladder afferent cells in the L6 - S1 DRG labeled by Fluorogold ( 40 microliters ) injected into the bladder wall did not exhibit NOS - IR in control animals ; however , following chronic CYP administration , a significant percentage of bladder afferent neurons were NOS - IR : L6 ( 19 . 8 + / - 4 . 6 % ) and S1 ( 25 . 3 + / - 2 . 9 % ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Chronic CYP administration |

In this paragraph, the disease entity is referred to as "chronic CYP administration". The paragraph describes the effect of this disease on the bladder afferent neurons, specifically an increase in NOS-IR (Nitric Oxide Synthase-Immunoreactivity) in L6 and S1 DRG (Dorsal Root Ganglia) neurons. However, the paragraph does not directly mention any specific disease or condition associated with NOS-IR or the increase in NOS-IR following chronic CYP administration. Therefore, the disease entity is identified as chronic CYP administration.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Chronic CYP administration |

The paragraph only mentions "chronic CYP administration" as a disease entity. All other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "Bladder afferent cells", "L6 - S1 DRG", "Fluorogold", "NOS-IR", and percentage values, are not disease entities but rather descriptors or measurements related to the disease.
